TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi MenuItem extends System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl implements class System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource
Public Class MenuItem Inherits HeaderedItemsControl Implements ICommandSource
type MenuItem = class inherit HeaderedItemsControl interface ICommandSource

summary.span: Represents a selectable item inside a .

span.span: Represents a selectable item inside a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，這表示其標頭和物件的集合可以是任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或面板）。 is a , which means its header and collection of objects can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. A可以有子功能表。A can have submenus. 子功能表中的物件組成的。The submenu of the is made up of the objects within the of a . 常會來包含其他物件，以建立巢狀的子功能表。It is common for a to contain other objects to create nested submenus. A可以有數個函式的其中一個：A can have one of several functions: - 您可以選擇叫用命令。It can be selected to invoke a command. - 它可以是其他功能表項目分隔符號。It can be a separator for other menu items. - 它可以是子功能表的標頭。It can be a header for a submenu. - 它可以是已核取或取消核取。It can be checked or unchecked. > [!NOTE] > 根據預設，的設定為。By default, the of a is set to . 預設的水平位置是。The default horizontal position of a is . 如果您設定的屬性透過、 堆疊面板的預設會套用，且會置中的項目。If you set the property of a through a , the stack panel's default is applied and the item is centered. 控制代碼事件，因此如果您將附加事件處理常式，絕不會呼叫您的處理常式。The handles the event, so if you attach an event handler to , your handler will never be called. 若要新增您自己的處理常式，訂閱事件或訂閱藉由呼叫具有`handledEventsToo`設定為`true`。To add your own handler, subscribe to the event or subscribe to by calling with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`. ## 自訂功能表項目控制項Customizing the MenuItem Control 若要將相同的屬性設定套用至多個控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設，讓控制項的獨特的外觀。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱 < [ 透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和狀態所特有，請參閱 < [Menu 樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/menu-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [Menu Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/menu-styles-and-templates.md). 此控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值，當控制項出現在應用程式。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式會決定由哪一個桌面佈景主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只能影響該屬性是否都存在於控制項的預設範本，並設定使用。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺化屬性清單中的 「 變更視覺結構的控制項 」 一節[透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立中的文字操作。The following example creates a to manipulate text in a . 包含物件，使用， ，並屬性和， ，以及事件。The contains objects that use the , , and properties and the , , and events. [!code-xaml[MenuItemCommandsAndEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItemCommandsAndEvents/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[MenuItemCommandsAndEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItemCommandsAndEvents/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MenuItemCommandsAndEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItemCommandsAndEvents/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Input::ICommand ^ Command { System::Windows::Input::ICommand ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Input::ICommand ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the command associated with the menu item.

span.span: Gets or sets the command associated with the menu item.
The command associated with the .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性用來建立命令與特定的關聯執行個體。This property is used to associate a command with a particular instance. 下列範例會關聯**複製**命令搭配，並自動提供給的輸入的手勢文字**Ctrl + C**。The following example associates the **Copy** command with a and automatically supplies the input gesture text **Ctrl+C**. 此範例不會設定屬性，但如是在執行階段的 「 複製 」。The example does not set the property, but the for the is "Copy" at run time. 您可以指定另一個標頭如果您想要不同。You can specify another header for the if you want it to be different. 如需如何繫結至想要的命令資訊，請參閱[將命令新增至 MenuItem](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/013d68a0-5373-4a68-bd91-5de574307370)。For information on how to bind to the desired command, see [Add a Command to a MenuItem](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/013d68a0-5373-4a68-bd91-5de574307370). [!code-xaml[MenuItems_snip#MenuItemCommand](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItems_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#menuitemcommand)] 命令，就會引發時按下 — 後方事件。A command is raised when a is clicked—just after the event. 根據下列優先順序項目上引發命令：The command is raised on the element according to the following priorities: 1. 如果上設定，該元素。If is set on the , that element is used. 2. 的包含。The of a that contains the . 3. 包含的主視窗的焦點目標。The focus target of the main window that contains a . 4. 按下。The that was clicked. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用功能表項目相關聯的命令的命令屬性。The following examples show how to use the command property to associate commands with menu items. [!code-xaml[MenuEvent#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuEvent/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#8)] [!code-csharp[MenuEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuEvent/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#9)]

The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性不會將輸入的筆勢關聯功能表項目;只要將文字加入至功能表項目。This property does not associate the input gesture with the menu item; it simply adds text to the menu item. 應用程式必須處理使用者的輸入，才能執行動作。The application must handle the user's input to carry out the action. 如需如何建立命令和功能表項目關聯的資訊，請參閱。For information on how to associate a command with a menu item, see . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性將鍵盤快速鍵文字指派給功能表項目。The following examples show how to use the property to assign keyboard shortcuts text to menu items. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設為`true`，設定為滑鼠捕捉及其子樹狀目錄。When is set to `true`, mouse capture is set to the and its subtree. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何開啟子功能表中的。The following example shows how to open a submenu of a . 在此範例中，名`fileMenu`包含稱為`recentFiles`具有子功能表。In this example, the called `fileMenu` contains a called `recentFiles` that has a submenu. 當`fileMenu`開啟時，就會引發事件並`FileMenu_Opened`事件處理常式會開啟子功能表中的`recentFiles`。When `fileMenu` is opened, the event is raised and the `FileMenu_Opened` event handler opens the submenu of `recentFiles`. [!code-xaml[MenuItems_snip#IsSubMenuOpenMenu](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItems_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#issubmenuopenmenu)] [!code-csharp[MenuItems_snip#IsSubMenuOpen](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItems_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#issubmenuopen)] [!code-vb[MenuItems_snip#IsSubMenuOpen](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItems_snip/visualbasic/pane1.xaml.vb#issubmenuopen)]

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the menu selects different item containers, depending on the type of the item in the underlying collection or some other heuristic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性就很有用，如果您想要建立繫結至集合的功能表項目。This property is useful if you want to create a menu by binding to a collection. 項目容器是 UI 元素，顯示集合中的物件。The item container is the UI element that displays the object in a collection. 如果您想要繫結至集合，來建立一個包含功能表物件和物件，設定屬性設為 true，並建立每種類型的集合中的物件。If you want to bind to a collection to create a menu that contains objects and objects, set the property to true and create an for each type of object in your collection. 每個必須包含或。Each must contain either a or a . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
